summary: Daniel is a maladjusted man, who after a failed suicide attempt, returns to restart his life from the poor periphery of Santiago, to downtown. In this journey he does not discover any ... See full summary »
cast: Héctor Silva|Jessica Calderón|Yani Escobar|José Melo|Alicia Astaburuaga|Barbarella Foster|Juan Caroca
title: El pejesapo
